messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a situation where Luck can be used?
When a skill or characteristic is applicable to a situation
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is Group Luck roll determined?
The player whose investigator has the lowest Luck score among those present in the scene
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if something bad is deemed to happen to one member of the group?
The Keeper asks who has the lowest Luck score and has that individual suffer the unfortunate event
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What optional rule is mentioned for spending Luck points?
Altering dice rolls at the end of this chapter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the necessary condition for a cab to appear?
It is a matter of chance whether a cab may be driving down that road.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is required to hail a cab at 2 o'clock in the morning?
Luck roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of puzzles may require an Intelligence (INT) roll?
Intellectual puzzles of some kind, such as solving a crossword puzzle or answering a riddle.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who decides the outcome of an Intelligence (INT) roll?
The Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to determine whether a cab may be driving down a road?
A Luck roll is required.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is usually proposed by the players when investigators are stuck?
An Idea roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is an Idea roll made?
Made in the same manner as an Intelligence roll, by rolling equal to or below the investigator’s Intelligence.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines whether a missed clue has been obtained easily or at a cost?
The success or failure of the Idea roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When is an Idea roll usually proposed?
When the players’ investigators have become stuck at a point in the investigation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the success or failure of an Idea roll?
The outcome of the Idea roll determines whether the missed clue has been obtained easily or at some cost to the investigators.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the success of a Know roll?
A roll equal to or under a character’s EDU value.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is represented by the Know roll?
The percentage chance that the investigator’s education supplied the information.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the success of a Know roll?
A roll equal to or under a character's EDU value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be used instead of a Know roll in a situation where a specific skill is more applicable?
A specific skill, at the Keeper's discretion
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an excellent use for the Know roll?
Identification of present-day earthly languages
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be considered when deciding to use a Know roll?
The Keeper's discretion
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Know roll represent in the game?
The Know roll represents what’s stored in the brain’s intellectual attic
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the success of a Know roll determined?
The success of a Know roll is determined by the roll equal to or under a character’s EDU value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When should a Know roll be used instead of a specific skill?
A Know roll should be used instead of a specific skill if the Keeper deems it appropriate
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the standard method for determining a victor in a melee combat between two investigators?
Opposed Skill Rolls, specifically Player versus Player and Melee Combat
